creator: janchan@transunion.hk
text:
Created attachment 27395
Problematic Excel

I am using the latest version of POI3.7 (even tried the 3.8-beta3), the problem of LeftoverDataException still exists in the attached XLS.

I tried to open the XLS by Excel, and resaved once. The problem is fixed.

But the problem is, the file is generated by a 3rd party and I don't know what tool generated the file. I can only access the file online. I can't resave a huge amount of files manually one-by-one.

Please Help!

I confirmed the problem in trunk. Something to fix in future releases.

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru
janchan@transunion.hk
text:
Thanks for your prompt response, Yegor.
Looking forward to the next release of POI.

Hi Yegor, 

Before the bug is fixed in the next version, can I have a quick fix for this?

I downloaded the source of 3.8-Beta4 and built a version by myself.
I tried to trace for the problem, but I have no idea where's the root cause of the problem.

Can you give me some suggestions, so that I can fix it and build a temporary version for our own use immediately? As we are now in a tight development schedule, and can not wait for a very long time.

Many thanks!

Regards,
Jan
creator: janchan@transunion.hk

text:
Fixed in r1169725, junit added.

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru
janchan@transunion.hk
text:
Thanks for your help to fix the problem.
I built a version, and its working now.

Thanks :)
